titleStmt.title: A warning-piece to repentance presented in an assize-sermon preached in the cathedral chruch of Lincoln. Aug. 15. 1664. / By William Reresby doctor in divinity.
titleStmt.author: Reresby, William, d. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Bedel, and T. Collins, at their Shop next the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

place.placeName: their Shop next the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleet-street
